author: mturk
msg: Added sendfilet (sendfile with timeout) function to skip the need
to call two additional JNI calls in case we wish nonblocking sendifle.

author: mturk
msg: If add queue is too large, do not return APR_ENOMEM, but rather
bail out from the add loop. Whats in the queue will be added on the next

author: mturk
msg: Remove obsolete Poll.socket, Poll.events and Poll.data calls.
Now Api uses indexed array for Poll.poll to minimize the JNI calls.

author: jfclere
msg: Check the return code of bind().
